name: HubToken

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner
renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: _transferOwnership

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation:
@dev Divides two numbers and returns the remainder (unsigned integer modulo),
reverts when dividing by zero.
attributes.name: mod

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
attributes.name: whenNotPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
attributes.name: whenPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
attributes.name: pause

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
attributes.name: unpause

attributes.documentation: @dev Total number of tokens in existence
attributes.name: totalSupply
balanceOf
allowance
transfer
approve
transferFrom
increaseApproval
decreaseApproval
_mint
_burn
_burnFrom

attributes.documentation:
@dev Burns a specific amount of tokens.
@param _value The amount of token to be burned.
attributes.name: burn
burnFrom

attributes.documentation:
@dev Overrides StandardToken._burn in order for burn and burnFrom to emit
an additional Burn event.
attributes.name: _burn
